page.title: 07The Guides
page.content: Guides in 1985 is good. We go out on lots of trips. Yesterday, 23rd June we went to Oxford City football ground to celebrate 75 years of Guides. There were about 600 people there.On 27th June we are having a party at our headquarters. We meet in the community hall from 7.00 - 9.00 o'clock every Thursday. Our leaders are called Harry and Mo; they are both ladies. Sometimes we do work for badges but most of the time we play games. We go out on nature trails, sometimes we are sent out to collect leaves, as many kinds as possible. The person with the most leaves does the drinks and washes the cups; most people dont try hard because they don't want the job.
